short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save images to refern with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save images to refern.app to use as art reference later with a single click.

Ever browsing the web and got inspired by an image and you want to save it as a reference for drawing later? 

This extension lets you click a single "save" button that shows up on any image you hover and automatically upload that image to refern in the background, so you can collect references as you scroll!

Once the extension is installed:
1. Simply sign up for a free refern account and set your capturer access code in the settings page on the side panel
2. Open the extension, and login with your @ and the access code you just set
3. Hover over images (that's not too small) and click save to save to refern! 
4. Or batch save all images on screen using the popup window

You can find all your saved images in the collections that you selected in refern.
